metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5195 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Irssi 0.8.17 before 0.8.21 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and crash) via a crafted ANSI x8 color code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5195` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3').
